title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\TextInput
name: TextInput
description:
============================================================================ Auxiliary proto messages.

Represents the natural language text to be processed.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.TextInput

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.text
params.description: Required. The UTF-8 encoded natural language text to be processed. Text length must not exceed 256 characters for virtual agent interactions.

params.name: data.language_code
params.description: Required. The language of this conversational query. See Language Support for a list of the currently supported language codes. Note that queries in the same session do not necessarily need to specify the same language.

methods.name: getText
methods.description:
Required. The UTF-8 encoded natural language text to be processed.
